h2_title: Daoist Mi Boss Fight and Guide
content: In his first phase, the Daoist Mi will come at you with flowing sword attacks, some of which can emit projectiles waves of force at range when they perform an upward slash in a reverse grip stance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Daoist_Mi.md', within the main section titled 'Daoist Mi', specifically from the subsection 'Daoist Mi Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
In his first phase, the Daoist Mi will come at you with flowing sword attacks, some of which can emit projectiles waves of force at range when they perform an upward slash in a reverse grip stance.
